about_the_game:
• Retro characters reimagined - Each inspired by a classic game from the 80's or 90's. Unique to this game is how different each character is. This isn't like Smash Bros where they all have fighting game moves and share the same core controls. Instead, I've meticulously kept them very similar to their inspirations, so some have a run button, some have 8-way aiming, some lose their powerup when hit, etc.. However, they're not total clones as they each have improvements, changes & new abilities.

  • In-game editor & Workshop support - Import your own graphics, music and sound effects. Create levels, tilesets, and character skins. Share it all via Steam Workshop.

  • Adventure Mode - The plan is to add a campaign with levels from each of the character's worlds.

  • Battle Mode - One-life rounds with a focus on items. Each character gets their own items/upgrades from the item spawn points. Characters can even have different item spawn rates, so weaker characters can trigger item spawns more rapidly, and vice-versa. Also, in 3 or 4 player free-for-all battles there's rubber-banding: the losing player can get more items/better items with the opposite for the winning player.

  • Play online with Steam's Remote Play Together, or locally on the couch with friends.

  • Full gamepad support - I playtest the game with my old SNES controller from the 90's.

short_description: Local multiplayer platformer featuring retro characters, each with a playstyle inspired by an 80's-90's game. Play online with Steam Remote Play. Use the in-game editor to import art, music & sound effects and create character skins, campaigns, arenas, & tilesets then share it on Steam Workshop.
